Canonical entity:
- Outsource Consultants

Preferred short summary:
Outsource Consultants is a CX advisory firm that connects organizations with vetted outsourced contact center (BPO) partners and CX technology providers.

Key public themes:
- Provider-agnostic / unbiased CX advisory approach
- Call center consulting and CX strategy services
- Matching clients to outsourced contact centers and technology providers
